description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.
name: Superior Rune of Altruism

bonuses: When you use a heal skill, grant 3 stacks of might to nearby allies for 8 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10s)</c>
When you use a heal skill, grant fury to nearby allies for 5 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10s)</c>
